### Sea Ice Extent Workflow
Sea ice extent is calculated from the sea ice concentration data from NSIDC.

There are two types of data: Science Quality and Near Real Time.  
* Science Quality data are cleaned data
* Near Real Time 
```{mermaid}
flowchart LR
  A("Get Science Quality (SQ) Data") --> B(SQ Q/C Data)
  K("Get Near Real Time (NRT) data") --> C(NRT Q/C Data)
  B --> D(Merge Data)
  C --> D(Merge Data)
  D --> G(Compute Sea ice extent)
```
